name: Healthyfied Beef Caldereta
description: This Healthyfied Beef Caldereta recipe is perfect for those following a low-carb and low-sodium diet. Designed with health in mind, it remains bursting with flavors, making it a perfect choice for anyone looking to enjoy a healthier version of this classic dish.
recipeIngredient: 2  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: dice the bell pepper, capsicum, and pickle chips; measure out the passata, black pepper, and salt.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the beef brisket into small, bite-sized pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, combine the beef brisket with salt and black pepper. Cook over medium heat until the beef is browned, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced bell pepper, capsicum, pickle chips, and passata to the pot. Stir well to combine.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Cover the pot and let the caldereta simmer on low heat until the beef is tender, about 45 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Adjust the seasoning with more salt and black pepper, if necessary, before serving.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
